channel.title: What happened to the old forum?
channel.description:
Since I had to register for this new forum, I assume it was started from scratch, the old forum wasn't imported into it.
How about the content from the old forum, is it just lost?

item.title: What happened to the old forum?
item.dc:creator: grunge
item.description:
Thank you very much for the Inforamtion Adrelanos!

Best Regards!

Grunge

Read full topic
item.source: What happened to the old forum?

item.title: What happened to the old forum?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Importing would be difficult since there is no existing import tool. And writing such a software or manually doing it seemed not worthwhile.

The old forum is still here:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Special:AWCforum/

Still linked from the support page:

Whonix – 1 May 20

Support - Whonix

Various Ways to get Help with Whonix ™. Free and Professional Support available.

We won’t delete it unless it causes any problems.

Read full topic
item.source: What happened to the old forum?
